title: pOgabEDa
sahitya:
pOgabEDa nigamAnuta mathurege pOgabEDa hariye


anupallavi

  pOguve nI punarAgamavendige hEge tALuvevo nAgamardana krSNa


caraNam 1    bAlatanadi bahu lIlegaLinda gOpAlaranoDe gUDi bALa prEmadi nammAlayadoLa pokku 
pAlu beNNeya bEDi shIla mUruti ninnolumege silukida bAleyarA smaranambige gurimADi
    caraNam 2    huTTiddu mathure tandiTTaddu gOkulake paTTadarasu enisi beTTili beTTavanetti porede 
banda kaSTava pariharisi krSNmUruti paramESThigaLarase nammiSTa dEvane Iga biTTu pOgadiro
    caraNam 3    mAramaNane karuNAkaranembudu tOralillavo namage sErida vara more lAlisadirdaDe 
yArelo gati namage mArajanaka guru purndara viTTala gAru mADade namma sEri sukhisutiru
